item.title: Cindy add a quote by Angelica Huston as Morticia Addams
item.description: "You have taken Fester and turned him into your personal love slave. I respect that. But Debbie (gesturing at the decor around her)...PASTELS?" -- Angelica Huston as Morticia Addams

item.title: Cindy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Cindy add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field." -- Niels Bohr

item.title: Cindy add a quote by Galileo Galilei
item.description:
"<i>Sì perché l'autorità dell'opinione di mille nelle scienze non val per una scintilla di ragione di un solo, sì perché le presenti osservazioni spogliano d'autorità i decreti de' passati scrittori, i quali se vedute l'avessero, avrebbono diversamente determinato.</i>
For in the sciences the authority of thousands of opinions is not worth as much as one tiny spark of reason in an individual man. Besides, the modern observations deprive all former writers of any authority, since if they had seen what we see, they would have judged as we judge." -- Galileo Galilei

item.title: Cindy add a quote by Galileo Galilei
item.description: "In questions of science, the authority of a thousand is not worth the humble reasoning of a single individual." -- Galileo Galilei

item.title: Cindy add a quote by Yogi Berra
item.description: "You can observe a lot just by watching." -- Yogi Berra

item.title: Cindy add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Another belief of mine: that everyone else my age is an adult, whereas I am merely in disguise." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Cindy add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "With enough courage, you can do without a reputation." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Cindy add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "The best way of keeping a secret is to pretend there isn't one." -- Margaret Atwood
